[Madison Gehringer](../who-we-are.qmd#madison-gehringer), [Belle Peterson](../who-we-are.qmd#belle-peterson), and Andrea gave updates about PLAY.

Andrea and [Yinghe Liu](../who-we-are.qmd#yinghe-liu) talked about progress on the Databrary [Guide](https://databrary.github.io/guide/).
